application

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • application.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Cell
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    Cell.java

    This class replicates all the cells on the grid,while playing the game and thus provides the user the facility to click on it,this class is responsible for displaying of spheres,getting next turn,moreover the animations are also implemented in this class itself.
    Author:
    Dhruv Bhagat 2016146, Sushant Kumar Singh 2016103
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeListener()
      changes the listener of cell when the game is played on LAN so that handleMouseClient is new listener which writes move to server
      void clicked()
      utility for performing click by the client while playing on LAN
      void handleMouseClick(boolean isVirtual)
      This function gets the turn from the game class and defines its owner accordingly which in turn is responsible for making the
      the current move and calling the function increase mass which has the logic for addition/deletion/animation of orbs.
      This also saves the current moves internally
      void handleMouseClickClient()
      When the game is played on LAN this method writes the step taken to server
      void increaseMass(boolean isVirtual, Player curPlayer)
      This method is the root method which defines how the spheres are placed inside the cells,how they are splitting
      This method also checks for the splitting conditions and splits according to the animation logic defined in this function itself
      void makeavailable(javafx.animation.ParallelTransition pt)
      This method defines the things to do after the Splitting animation has finished
      (package private) void setCellStyle(java.lang.String str)
      Method that internally calls setCellStyle as defined by game
      (package private) void setmaterialSpheres(java.lang.String newColor)
      It sets the materials of the Sphere according to the color provided which in turn is in accordance with the current player

      • Cell

        public Cell(char type,
            int mrow,
            int mcol,
            int[] dimension,
            Game g,
            Grid curGrid)
        Constructor that Initializes the Cell with its type,row,column, dimension ,its game and its grid.
        Parameters:
        type - type of cell
        mrow - its row
        mcol - its column
        dimension - its dimension
        g - its present game
        curGrid - its present grid

    • Method Detail

      • setCellStyle

        void setCellStyle(java.lang.String str)
        Method that internally calls setCellStyle as defined by game
        Parameters:
        str - This is the String parameter that holds the string equivalent of color to be put,according to the turn

      • setmaterialSpheres

        void setmaterialSpheres(java.lang.String newColor)
        It sets the materials of the Sphere according to the color provided which in turn is in accordance with the current player
        Parameters:
        newColor - This is the first parameter of setmaterialSpheres

      • makeavailable

        public void makeavailable(javafx.animation.ParallelTransition pt)
        This method defines the things to do after the Splitting animation has finished
        Parameters:
        pt - This is the first parameter of makeavailable

      • increaseMass

        public void increaseMass(boolean isVirtual,
                         Player curPlayer)
        This method is the root method which defines how the spheres are placed inside the cells,how they are splitting
        This method also checks for the splitting conditions and splits according to the animation logic defined in this function itself
        Parameters:
        isVirtual - The first parameter,Check on whether player is real or virtual
        curPlayer - The Second paramter,denotes the current player

      • handleMouseClick

        public void handleMouseClick(boolean isVirtual)
        This function gets the turn from the game class and defines its owner accordingly which in turn is responsible for making the
        the current move and calling the function increase mass which has the logic for addition/deletion/animation of orbs.
        This also saves the current moves internally
        Parameters:
        isVirtual - The first paramter,defines whether player is virtual or real

      • handleMouseClickClient

        public void handleMouseClickClient()
        When the game is played on LAN this method writes the step taken to server

      • clicked

        public void clicked()
        utility for performing click by the client while playing on LAN

      • changeListener

        public void changeListener()
        changes the listener of cell when the game is played on LAN so that handleMouseClient is new listener which writes move to server
